name: Century Tuna Flakes
subTitle: Hot And Spicy. 180 g
details: Century Tuna Flakes Hot And Spicy offers a bold and fiery twist to your meals with its premium quality tuna flakes. Perfectly seasoned with a blend of spices, this product delivers a spicy kick that is sure to satisfy those who crave heat. Ideal for quick meals, sandwiches, or as a topping for salads, these tuna flakes are a versatile addition to any kitchen.

name: 555 Sardines Spanish Style
subTitle: 155 g
details: Savor special sardines slow-cooked with select spices to give it that classic blend of Spanish flavors that can be enjoyed every day.

name: Spam Luncheon Meat
subTitle: Regular. 12 oz
details: Spam Luncheon Meat Regular is a versatile canned meat product made from high-quality pork, offering a convenient and tasty option for meals. Its rich flavor and tender texture make it perfect for sandwiches, salads, or as a main ingredient in various dishes. Simply slice, dice, or fry it to add a savory touch to your favorite recipes.

name: Clover Chips
subTitle: Cheese. 55 g
details: Clover Chips Cheese offers a delightful crunch combined with a rich, cheesy flavor that is perfect for snacking any time of the day. Each chip is crafted to deliver a satisfying taste experience that cheese lovers will adore. Whether you're enjoying a movie night or a casual gathering, Clover Chips Cheese is an ideal choice to satisfy your savory cravings.

name: Roller Coaster
subTitle: Cheese. 85 g
details: Jack 'n Jill Roller Coaster Buddy Size - Cheese offers a delightful snacking experience with its crunchy cheese-flavored potato rings. Perfect for sharing, this snack is ideal for parties or movie nights. Enjoy the bold cheese flavor and satisfying crunch in every bite.

name: Ricoa Flat Tops
subTitle: 50 g x 10pcs
details: Ricoa Flat Tops 10 pcs is a delightful treat featuring rich chocolate pieces known for their smooth texture and sweet taste. Perfect for sharing or enjoying as a quick snack, these individually wrapped chocolates offer a burst of flavor in every bite. Whether you're indulging yourself or gifting them to a friend, Ricoa Flat Tops are sure to satisfy any sweet tooth.

name: Judge Chewing Gum
subTitle: Bricks Spearmint. 3.4 g x 50 pcs
details: Judge Bricks Spearmint Chewing Gum brings a refreshing burst of minty freshness with every chew. Perfect for keeping your breath fresh throughout the day, this gum is crafted with quality ingredients to ensure a long-lasting flavor. Its convenient packaging makes it easy to carry in your pocket or bag, so you can enjoy a fresh breath boost whenever you need it. Whether you're at work, on a date, or just out and about, Judge Bricks Spearmint Chewing Gum is your go-to for a quick and easy refresh.
